website_summaries.verdict: If comfort, function, and style are a big factors in determining the shoe to buy, one won’t regret in giving the Ecco Urban Lifestyle Low a try. It has brought the brand’s trademark minimalist yet stylish design.Most users did not have a problem in pairing this low-profile sneaker with any outfit. The quality construction makes it bear long walks every day. Some found the narrow toe box a bit stressful, but once the foot mingles with the shoe more, walking might become a great past time.
pros: Majority of the users said that the low-top Ecco Urban Lifestyle Low is very stylish and comfortable
Several buyers noticed that the shoe breathes well without making the feet sweaty
Its sporty and versatile design makes it perfect for casual or casual business activities, said most wearers
The sneaker comes in different colors such as black, amber and coffee
A lot of people loved to wear Dockers, shorts, and slacks with it
A lot of users commended its well-made, durable and good quality construction that could last for long periods of walking and trail hiking
The Ecco Urban Lifestyle Low has good support, according to many purchasers
Most were impressed with its non-slip soles that can be reliably used on wet surfaces
cons: Some of the buyers complained that the shoe was tough on the first use and uncomfortable
A few wearers noticed that they got blisters on the back of the heel
Several users were disappointed with the low-top shoe’s restricting toe box
It runs a bit small and narrow
There were a few people who did not like the flat sole with no arch support
Others added that the shoe was not good for flat-footed people

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: If this shoe comes in a wide model I would be all over it. I couldn’t find it in a wide so I took a chance hoping that the shoe ran a little wider. I was set to return the shoe then my son saw them and said “hey let me try those on”, perfect fit. Happy birthday son they are all yours. He loves them. There you go somebody is happy. I bought Rockport brand instead.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Like a slipper
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable very light. Have worn ECCO befo, and I’m aware they run a little bit small for me. But too be honest, I have a wide foot. I’ve been wearing a waterproof work boot for work and switching to the Ecco , makes me feel like I am wearing slippers. Wonderful
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Great color and style.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this ECCO style of shoe before and continue to buy them. I have a narrow foot and need support due to past foot problems. I can walk all day in this shoe and have no foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes and nicer than hikers
customer_reviews.text: My old feet need better arch support. I knew that and had the upgrade on hand. These are my long distance walkers for Europe now.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality shoe that fits well and is comfortable right out of the box. Excellent arch support for urban and around town wear. Best worn with thin socks.
customer_reviews.author: Mindful

customer_reviews.title: Solid casual all-a-rounder
customer_reviews.text: Great fit out of the box. I normally need a EEE width so ordered a size up. Shoes fit snug but will stretch and Ecco has a removable insole that would be an easy fix. Ordered these as a casual work travel shoe - only want to travel with one pair when possible for work and gym.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: Defective shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these. Had them for three months and they look horrible. The shoe deformed after a month. The front started to fold, its pointing up now. Can not wear them. The black are worst than the brown. I normally swear by Ecco. Not this time.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Poltorak

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you'd expect from Ecco
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 5+ pair of Ecco's and these are just as good as the previous. These run a little wide which is perfect for me, and do not need to be broken in. They are comfortable on day one and I love them. According to my fitness tracker, I've logged over 600 miles on one pair and they look barely used.
customer_reviews.author: Vulpe

customer_reviews.title: Good fitting shoe from Ecco
customer_reviews.text: I have found that the Urban lifestyle Ecco shoes to be amongst the most comfortable out there. They provide ample ankle support along with Gore-Tex outer material. They are good for walking in the city and short hikes alike. I believe these shoes are actually discontinued so looking for this specific model has become harder as time goes by. The tread is excellent and the wide fitting shoe enables you to wear for comfort. This seller seems to be of good quality with shipping quick and no issues with the shoes themselves.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Well made comfortable urban walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Well made comfortable urban walking shoes. I have to buy shoes where the insoles are removeable and also not part of the main shoe structure, so I can use orthopedic insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Heinrich W

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Urban Lifestyle Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: Designed for adventures, from urban to rural environments, these shoes are ideal for men with an active, active life.
